index.hero-heading: Federal taxes are due by April 15th
index.hero-desc: We'll walk you through our free federal tax tool, to ensure you complete your taxes on time and with ease.
index.point-1: TaxGuru is your reliable companion for filing your federal taxes effortlessly. Say goodbye to the stress of tax season and embrace a seamless experience with our platform.
index.point-2: Our platform uses the latest IRS guidelines to calculate your returns with precision, ensuring you get every dollar you're entitled to, and providing you with peace-of-mind.

auth.tagline: Get started today and file your federal taxes with ease.
auth.tagline-desc: We'll walk you through the process to ensure 100% accuracy and a maximum refund.
auth.point-1-desc: We believe you should have easy and free access to file your federal taxes. That's why we created a seamless platform to allow you to file at no cost.
auth.point-2-desc: We prioritize your data's safety with top-notch security measures to ensure your information stays confidential and protected from unauthorized access.

account.desc1: View and manage your account details

filing-info.title: Filing Information
filing-info.desc: We need a bit more information about your filing status.
filing-info.dependents: How many dependents can you claim?
filing-info.isDependent: Can someone claim you as a dependent?

w2.title: W-2 Information
w2.desc: If you don't have any W-2 information to enter, you can skip this section.

1099.title: Self Employment
1099.desc: This information can be found on form 1099-NEC. If you don't have any self employment income to enter, you can skip this section.
